author: kfogel
msg: * propaganda.html: Add some more testimonials.  The next time someone
posts to users@ asking for testimonials, we will be *so* ready.
Remove the Fog Creek message board post, because our rename
support isn't yet good enough to justify a testimonial about it.
Tweak formatting on some other testimonials.

author: sussman
msg: * STATUS:  nominate r10394 and cast votes.

author: ghudson
msg: Use the repository's uuid as the svnserve default realm, instead of
the path to the repository relative to the virtual root.  Fixes a bug
where said path was improperly computed.

author: sussman
msg: * STATUS:  nominate r10385 and cast votes.

author: maxb
msg: * STATUS (r10371): Now verified: Fixes the python bindings on OS X.
